content: here is the free pattern for the dream catcher hat to go along with the dream catcher baby blanket i made the hat to use up some of the leftovers from the blanket it could be made in one color which would take one skein of sweater the size can easily be made to fit a larger head by adding increments of 4 stitches there is no shaping so this is not a problem the length would need to increased as the size gets larger have fun
